channel.title: Asteroids on Arran White's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Asteroids on Arran White's Blog

item.title: Asteroids
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <meta charset="utf-8">
        <title>Asteroids</title>
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto" rel="stylesheet">
        <style media="screen">
            #canvas {
                display: block;
                position: fixed;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                z-index: 50;
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        <canvas tabindex="1" id="canvas"></canvas>
        <script src="https://rawgit.com/arrwhidev/canvas-game-loop/master/canvas.js"></script>
        <script src="https://cdn.rawgit.com/arrwhidev/asteroids/RELEASE/v0.2/dist/bundle.js" charset="utf-8"></script>
    </body>
</html>
